mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia and Party at Mount Vernon, January 14, 1947
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rowe, Abbie, 1905-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia and Party posing on the east lawn of Mount Vernon. The Crown Prince stands in the center front and Mount Vernon's Resident Superintendent Charles C. Wall stands fourth from the left. The photograph is adhered to card stock with a printed caption below: With the home of George Washington in the background, His Royal Highness and his party pose on the lawn for a group picture before leaving Mount Vernon.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
